SELECT A.SNSBOARD_SEQ AS snsboardSeq, A.SNSBOARD_SUBJECT AS snsboardSubject, A.SNSBOARD_CONTENT AS snsboardContent, A.SNSBOARD_REGDATE AS snsboardRegdate, A.SNSBOARD_BLIND AS snsboardBlind, A.SNSBOARD_STAT AS snsboardStat, A.USER_EMAIL_ID_FK AS userEmailIdFk, A.CATEGORY_SEQ_FK AS categorySeqFk, B.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, B.CATEGORY_TYPE AS categoryType, (SELECT count(*) FROM SNSCOMMENT comment WHERE comment.SNSBOARD_SEQ_FK = A.SNSBOARD_SEQ ) AS commentCnt, (SELECT SNSCOMMENT_CONTENT FROM SNSCOMMENT comment WHERE comment.SNSBOARD_SEQ_FK = A.SNSBOARD_SEQ order by SNSCOMMENT_REGDATE desc limit 0,1 ) AS commentFirst FROM SNSBOARD A INNER JOIN SNSCATEGORY B ON A.CATEGORY_SEQ_FK = B.CATEGORY_SEQ WHERE A.SNSBOARD_STAT ='show' AND A.SNSBOARD_BLIND = 'n'
AND A.UNIVERSITY_SEQ = #{universitySeq}
AND (A.SNSBOARD_SUBJECT like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%') OR A.SNSBOARD_CONTENT like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%'))
ORDER BY A.SNSBOARD_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.SNSBOARD_SEQ AS snsboardSeq, A.SNSBOARD_SUBJECT AS snsboardSubject, A.SNSBOARD_CONTENT AS snsboardContent, A.SNSBOARD_REGDATE AS snsboardRegdate, A.SNSBOARD_BLIND AS snsboardBlind, A.SNSBOARD_STAT AS snsboardStat, A.USER_EMAIL_ID_FK AS userEmailIdFk , B.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName,B.CATEGORY_TYPE AS categoryType,(SELECT count(*) FROM SNSCOMMENT comment WHERE comment.SNSBOARD_SEQ_FK = A.SNSBOARD_SEQ ) AS commentCnt FROM SNSBOARD A INNER JOIN SNSCATEGORY B WHERE A.CATEGORY_SEQ_FK = B.CATEGORY_SEQ AND A.SNSBOARD_SEQ= #{boardSeq}
SELECT SNSBOARDFILE_SEQ AS snsboardfileSeq, SNSBOARDFILE_FILENAME AS snsboardfileFileName, SNSBOARD_SEQ_FK AS snsboardSeqFk FROM SNSBOARDFILE WHERE SNSBOARD_SEQ_FK= #{boardSeq}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SNSBOARD A INNER JOIN SNSCATEGORY B ON A.CATEGORY_SEQ_FK = B.CATEGORY_SEQ WHERE A.SNSBOARD_STAT ='show' AND A.SNSBOARD_BLIND = 'n'
AND (A.SNSBOARD_SUBJECT like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%') OR A.SNSBOARD_CONTENT like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNSBOARD (SNSBOARD_SUBJECT, SNSBOARD_CONTENT, USER_EMAIL_ID_FK, CATEGORY_SEQ_FK,UNIVERSITY_SEQ) VALUES (#{snsboardSubject}, #{snsboardContent}, #{userEmailIdFk}, #{categorySeqFk},#{universitySeq});

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SNSCOMMENT (SNSCOMMENT_CONTENT, USER_EMAIL_ID_FK, SNSBOARD_SEQ_FK,SNSCOMMENT_FILENAME) VALUES (#{snscommentContent}, #{userEmailIdFk}, #{snsboardSeqFk}, #{snscommentFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT C.SNSCOMMENT_SEQ AS snscommentSeq, C.SNSCOMMENT_CONTENT AS snscommentContent, C.SNSCOMMENT_REGDATE AS snscommentRegdate, C.SNSCOMMENT_BLIND AS snscommentBlind, C.SNSCOMMENT_THREAD AS snscommentThread, C.SNSCOMMENT_DEPTH AS snscommentDepth, C.SNSCOMMENT_FILENAME AS snscommentFilename, C.USER_EMAIL_ID_FK AS userEmailIdFk, C.SNSBOARD_SEQ_FK AS snsboardSeqFk FROM SNSCOMMENT AS C WHERE C.SNSBOARD_SEQ_FK = #{boardSeq} AND C.SNSCOMMENT_BLIND = 'n'
